sourcesContent:
import "./App.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { get } from "./BooksAPI"; import Card from "./Card"; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const { id } = useParams(); const [book, setBook] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { if (id) { get(id).then((book) => setBook(book)); } }, [id]); console.log(book); return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    Currently Reading

      {/* show book info id */}
    1. To Kill a Mockingbird
      Harper Lee
    2. Ender's Game
      Orson Scott Card
    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
